review: Stupid design.  The problem is that I wanted to be able to use it when traveling on the hotel televisions.The problem is, that it provides no interface to "log in" to a secured network that requires you to "Accept TOS".  YOu know, like when you log into a hotel's wifi, and the first web page you go to gets redirected to the TOS contract that you must click yes/accept on before it will let your device use the wi-fi.  Well, this does not let you do that.  Stupid!
author: Straight Shooter "Big Daddy Chad"

review: There is very little free content through Fire TV, something that is not clear when you are researching about this product. It is basically hardware to deliver Amazon Prime content. The Netflix and Hulu apps did not work for me and could not understand what was wrong with it. On the plus side the onboarding experience was super easy.
